schools.NCESDist: Text, (This field represents the 7-digit National Center for Educational Statistics (NCES) school district identification number. The first 2 digits identify the state and the last 5 digits identify the school district. Combined, they make a unique 7-digit ID for each school district.),
schools.NCESSchool: Text, (This field represents the 5-digit NCES school identification number. The NCESSchool combined with the NCESDist form a unique 12-digit ID for each school.),
schools.StatusType: Text, (This field identifies the status of the district.), ('Active', 'Closed', 'Merged', 'Pending')
schools.StreetAbr: Text, (The abbreviated street address of the school, district, or administrative authorityâs physical location.),
schools.Ext: Text, (The phone number extension of the school, district, or administrative authority.),
schools.Website: Text, (The website address of the school, district, or administrative authority.),
schools.Charter: Integer, (This field identifies a charter school.), (1, 0)
schools.FundingType: Text, (Indicates the charter school funding type),
schools.DOCType: Text, (The District Ownership Code Type is the text description of the DOC category.),
schools.SOC: Text, (The School Ownership Code is a numeric code used to identify the type of school.),
schools.SOCType: Text, (The School Ownership Code Type is the text description of the type of school.),
schools.EdOpsCode: Text, (The Education Option Code is a short text description of the type of education offered.),
schools.EILCode: Text, (The Educational Instruction Level Code is a short text description of the institution's type relative to the grade range served.),
schools.EILName: Text, (The Educational Instruction Level Name is the long text description of the institutionâs type relative to the grade range served.),
schools.GSoffered: Text, (The grade span offered is the lowest grade and the highest grade offered or supported by the school, district, or administrative authority. This field might differ from the grade span served as reported in the most recent certified California Longitudinal Pupil Achievement (CALPADS) Fall 1 data collection.),
schools.GSserved: Text, (It is the lowest grade and the highest grade of student enrollment as reported in the most recent certified CALPADS Fall 1 data collection. Only Kâ12 enrollment is reported through CALPADS. This field may differ from the grade span offered.),
schools.Virtual: Text, (This field identifies the type of virtual instruction offered by the school. Virtual instruction is instruction in which students and teachers are separated by time and/or location, and interaction occurs via computers and/or telecommunications technologies.), ('P', 'N', 'F')
schools.Magnet: Integer, (This field identifies whether a school is a magnet school and/or provides a magnet program.), (0, 1)
schools.Latitude: Real, (The angular distance (expressed in degrees) between the location of the school, district, or administrative authority and the equator measured north to south.),
schools.Longitude: Real, (The angular distance (expressed in degrees) between the location of the school, district, or administrative authority and the prime meridian (Greenwich, England) measured from west to east.),

cards.artist: Text, (The name of the artist that illustrated the card art.),
cards.asciiName: Text, (The ASCII(opens new window) (Basic/128) code formatted card name with no special unicode characters.),
cards.availability: Text, (A list of the card's available printing types.),
cards.borderColor: Text, (The color of the card border.), ('black', 'white', 'borderless', 'silver', 'gold')
cards.colorIdentity: Text, (A list of all the colors found in manaCost, colorIndicator, and text),
cards.colorIndicator: Text, (A list of all the colors in the color indicator (The symbol prefixed to a card's types).),
cards.colors: Text, (A list of all the colors in manaCost and colorIndicator.),
cards.convertedManaCost: Real, (The converted mana cost of the card. Use the manaValue property.),
cards.duelDeck: Text, (The indicator for which duel deck the card is in.), ('a', 'b')
cards.faceConvertedManaCost: Real, (The converted mana cost or mana value for the face for either half or part of the card.),
cards.faceName: Text, (The name on the face of the card.),
cards.flavorName: Text, (The promotional card name printed above the true card name on special cards that has no game function.),
cards.flavorText: Text, (The italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.),
cards.frameVersion: Text, (The version of the card frame style.), ('2003', '1993', '2015', '1997', 'future')
cards.hand: Text, (The starting maximum hand size total modifier.),
cards.hasAlternativeDeckLimit: Integer, (If the card allows a value other than 4 copies in a deck.), (0, 1)
cards.hasContentWarning: Integer, (If the card marked by Wizards of the Coast (opens new window) for having sensitive content. See this official article (opens new window) for more information.), (0, 1)
cards.hasFoil: Integer, (If the card can be found in foil), (0, 1)
cards.hasNonFoil: Integer, (If the card can be found in non-foil), (1, 0)
cards.isAlternative: Integer, (If the card is an alternate variation to an original printing), (0, 1)
cards.isFullArt: Integer, (If the card has full artwork.), (0, 1)
cards.isOnlineOnly: Integer, (If the card is only available in online game variations.), (0, 1)
cards.isPromo: Integer, (If the card is a promotional printing.), (0, 1)
cards.isReprint: Integer, (If the card has been reprinted.), (1, 0)
cards.isReserved: Integer, (If the card is on the Magic: The Gathering Reserved List (opens new window)), (0, 1)
cards.isStarter: Integer, (If the card is found in a starter deck such as Planeswalker/Brawl decks.), (0, 1)
cards.isStorySpotlight: Integer, (If the card is a Story Spotlight card.), (0, 1)
cards.isTextless: Integer, (If the card does not have a text box.), (0, 1)
cards.isTimeshifted: Integer, (If the card is time shifted), (0, 1)
cards.keywords: Text, (A list of keywords found on the card.),
cards.layout: Text, (The type of card layout. For a token card, this will be "token"),
cards.leadershipSkills: Text, (A list of formats the card is legal to be a commander in),
cards.life: Text, (The starting life total modifier. A plus or minus character precedes an integer.),
cards.loyalty: Text, (The starting loyalty value of the card.),
cards.manaCost: Text, (The mana cost of the card wrapped in brackets for each value.),
cards.name: Text, (The name of the card.),
cards.printings: Text, (A list of set printing codes the card was printed in, formatted in uppercase.),
cards.promoTypes: Text, (A list of promotional types for a card.),
cards.purchaseUrls: Text, (Links that navigate to websites where the card can be purchased.),
cards.setCode: Text, (The set printing code that the card is from.),
cards.side: Text, (The identifier of the card side.), ('a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e')
cards.subtypes: Text, (A list of card subtypes found after em-dash.),
cards.supertypes: Text, (A list of card supertypes found before em-dash.),
cards.text: Text, (The rules text of the card.),
cards.type: Text, (The type of the card as visible, including any supertypes and subtypes.),
cards.types: Text, (A list of all card types of the card, including Unâsets and gameplay variants.),
cards.uuid: Text, (The universal unique identifier (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.),
cards.watermark: Text, (The name of the watermark on the card.),

foreign_data.multiverseid: Integer, (The foreign multiverse identifier of the card.),
